content: free pattern in finnish english and swedish **moomin scarf** this lovely moomin-themed scarf is worked in double knitting use novita muumintalo yarn or any dk yarn in your favourite colours **one size** **finished dimensions** ca 19 x 185 cm **yarn demand** novita muumitalo snorkmaiden 250 g and moomintroll 200 g **yarn alternative novita wonder wool dk 1 ** **needles** novita 3 5 mm us4 or size needed for gauge **designer susanna mertsalmi** 1 https //novita com/en/products/novita-wonder-wool-dk-50-g-100-villalanka colour+=308+jade&collection=dk-yarns
